title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for g'(0.3)

1 point is earned for the integral expression

1 point is earned for g(0.3)

1 point is earned for the equation

g'(0.3) = -0.472161

g(0.3)=2+ ∫ 1 0.3 g'(x)dx=1.546007 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4F0B@

An equation for the line tangent to the graph of g is y = 1.546-0.472(x-0.3).
